title: Pulaski Co. Investigating Accidental Shooting
content:
The Pulaski County Sheriff says that EMS responded to the report of an accidental, self-inflicted gunshot wound Wednesday morning.
EMS says that Ward Correll was found inside his home with a gunshot wound in his abdomen.
He was treated at Lake Cumberland Regional Hospital before being transported to a UK Hospital.
The Sheriff says Correll called a family member or friend who called 911.
